name: specVersion
description: The version of the 3T-SBOM-EMS specifications with which the SBOM node element is compliant.
serializationComment: this attribute can be ommited during serialization when its value is equal to the value from the parent element

name: name
description: The name of the SBOM node element.

name: identifier
description: The unique identifier of the SBOM node element.

name: identificationAuthority
description: The identification authority, for which the identifier is globally unique. If empty, the identifier is unique within the scope of SBOM document.
serializationComment: this attribute can be ommited during serialization when its value is equal to the value from the parent element

name: created
description: The creation date of the SBOM node element
serializationComment: this attribute can be ommited during serialization when its value is equal to the value from the parent element

name: modified
description: The modification date of the SBOM node element
serializationComment: this attribute can be ommited during serialization when its value is equal to the value from the parent element

name: creator
description: The creator agent of the SBOM node element.
serializationComment: this shared association can be serialized inline for readability and compactness purposes; it can be ommited during serialization when its value is equal to the value from the parent element

name: annotation
description: The element(s) capturing annotations to the SBOM node element.

name: licenseInfo
description: The element capturing the license information relatived to the SBOM component item.
serializationComment: this shared association can be serialized inline for readability and compactness purposes; it can be ommited during serialization when its value is equal to the value from the parent element

name: identifier
description: The unique identifier of the SBOM document node element.

name: artifact
description: The element capturing the main artifact, detailed by the SBOM document.
serializationComment: this shared association can be serialized inline for readability and compactness purposes

name: pedigreeInfo
description: The element capturing pedigree information relative to the artifact.

name: checksum
description: The element(s) capturing the checksum of the document

name: populationMethod
description: The element capturing the way the SBOM document was created.

name: checksum
description: The element(s) capturing the checksum of the component item

name: supplier
description: The element capturing the supplier of the artifact.
serializationComment: this shared association can be serialized inline for readability and compactness purposes

name: identifier
description: The unique identifier of the SBOM artifact node element.

name: version
description: The version of the artifact.

name: component
description: The element(s) capturing the logical and/or physical file(s) and/or group(s) of file(s) supporting the delivery of the artifact.
serializationComment: this shared association can be serialized inline for readability and compactness purposes

name: type
description: The element capturing the type of the file.

name: identifier
description: The unique identifier of the SBOM file node element.

name: path
description: The path of the file.

name: item
description: The element(s) capturing the physical files and/or group(s) of file(s) within the file group.
serializationComment: this shared association can be serialized inline for readability and compactness purposes

name: type
description: The element capturing the type of agent.

name: identifier
description: The unique identifier of the SBOM agent node element.

name: value
description: The result of the checksum algorithm.

name: algorithm
description: The element capturing the algorithm used to compute the checksum value.

name: comment
description: The text of the annotation.

name: identifier
description: The unique identifier of the SBOM annotation node element.

name: type
description: The element capturing the type of annotation.

name: expression
description: The license expression, compliant with the licensing specifications. E.g.: the SPDX License Expression https://spdx.github.io/spdx-spec/appendix-IV-SPDX-license-expressions/.

name: identifier
description: The unique identifier of the SBOM license information node element.

name: action
description: The action(s) participating to the Artiract's pedigree
serializationComment: this shared association can be serialized inline for readability and compactness purposes

name: identifier
description: The unique identifier of the SBOM pedigree information node element.

name: editor
description: The editor of the tool.
serializationComment: this shared association can be serialized inline for readability and compactness purposes

name: identifier
description: The unique identifier of the SBOM tool node element.

name: version
description: The version of the tool.

name: servicePack
description: The service pack of the tool.

name: type
description: The type of the tool.

name: configuration
description: The element(s) capturing the configuration settings of the tool.

name: name
description: The name of the configuration setting of the tool.

name: value
description: The value of the configuration setting of the tool.

name: argument
description: The element(s) capturing the argument(s) of the action to be performed.

name: identifier
description: The unique identifier of the SBOM action node element.

name: instrument
description: The element(s) used to perform the action.
serializationComment: this shared association can be serialized inline for readability and compactness purposes

name: object
description: The element(s) on which the action is performed.

name: result
description: The element(s) resulting the action.

name: performer
description: The entity performing the action.
serializationComment: this shared association can be serialized inline for readability and compactness purposes

name: environment
description: The characterization of the environment in which the action is carried out.

name: location
description: The characterization of the location where the action is carried out.

name: started
description: The the time at which the action began.

name: ended
description: The the time at which the action ended.

name: name
description: The name of the argument of the action.

name: value
description: The value of the argument of the action.

name: type
description: The type of relationships between SBOM node elements.

name: identifier
description: The unique identifier of the SBOM relationship node element.

name: source
description: The element capturing the source SBOM node element.
serializationComment: this shared association can be serialized inline for readability and compactness purposes, both in the relationship element and in the source node element (as sourceOfRelationship association)

name: target
description: The element capturing the target SBOM node element.
serializationComment: this shared association can be serialized inline for readability and compactness purposes, both in the relationship element and in the target node element (as targetOfRelationship association)
